SELECT id, name, DTYPE FROM group_table
mapper.update: UPDATE group_table SET name = #{name}, DTYPE = "${groupType}" WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Ownership WHERE ((lowerId = #{id} AND ownershipType="GROUP") OR upper_id = #{id} ) AND id > 0; DELETE FROM group_table WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT g.* FROM group_table g, Ownership o WHERE NOT g.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND NOT (o.upper_id = ${id} AND o.lowerId = g.id) AND o.ownershipType = 'GROUP' AND NOT g.id = ${id}

SELECT DISTINCT gt.* FROM Item i, Ownership o1, Ownership o2, group_table gt WHERE (gt.id = o2.upper_id AND gt.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND o2.ownershipType = 'Item' AND o2.lowerId = ${id}) OR (gt.id = o1.upper_id AND gt.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND o1.lowerId = o2.upper_id AND o1.ownershipType = "GROUP" AND o2.lowerId = ${id})
